1.0.2.name: wordpress/mailplus-forms
1.0.2.description: With the MailPlus Forms Plugin web masters can easily integrate web forms or online surveys created in MailPlus on pages and posts without any technical knowledge. MailPlus is an online marketing platform which contains a user-friendly form editor with a lot of features. For example, matrix questions, conditional questions, skip logic/branching, multi-paging, extensive features for validating answers from respondents, great e-mail confirmation possibilities and much more.
